text.title: BBC - Home
text.text: BBC - Home BBC Homepage Skip to content Accessibility Help Your account Home News Sport Earth Reel Worklife Travel Culture Future Music TV Weather Sounds More menu More menu Search BBC Home News Sport Earth Reel Worklife Travel Culture Future Music TV Weather Sounds Close menu Welcome to the BBC BBC Homepage Live . Putin 'morally responsible' for 'unsurvivable' Novichok poisoning of Dawn Sturgess, inquiry finds An inquiry into Ms Sturgess' death in 2018 came after an attempt to poison an ex-Russian double agent living in Salisbury. Attribution Wiltshire Streeting orders review into rising demand for mental health and ADHD services Attribution Health Comments 1664 UK and Norway form naval alliance to hunt Russian submarines Attribution Europe Comments 333 Oil, defence and geopolitics: Why Putin is visiting Modi in Delhi Attribution World Household bills will rise to fund £28bn investment in energy network Attribution Business Comments 1437 Porn site fined £1m over age checks has never responded to Ofcom Attribution Technology Cough medicines or lemon and honey – which is better for you? Attribution Health Live . New satellite images capture Chinese warships being resupplied in Philippine Sea Attribution BBC Verify 'A rumbling sound and a loud bang' - small earthquake hits homes in north-west England Attribution England Sport headlines Keep up with the latest from BBC Sport 'Australia will have to admit he's a great' - Root hits elusive century Attribution England Comments 716 'England's finest' - Root hits first century in Australia  Video, 00:02:58 'England's finest' - Root hits first century in Australia Attribution Cricket 2:58 Trump and Infantino - too close for comfort? Attribution World Cup 'It's hard to take... it hurts' - Fin Smith on losing England place Attribution Rugby Union Comments 99 Live . Watch UK Championship: World champion Zhao v Zhang; Ding v Donaldson Attribution Snooker View more Around the UK The top stories from England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland Woman thought she was hungover before sudden death linked to contraceptive Attribution Manchester Flu cases in Scotland more than double in a week Attribution Scotland Politics Comments 72 MND took our son at 14 - anyone at any age can get it Attribution Wales 'This is the most severe flu outbreak that I've experienced' - children's doctor Attribution Northern Ireland Find your regional news Attribution News View more Entertainment and TV Latest news and must-see moments Live . Sabrina Carpenter's Busy Woman one of Radio 1's biggest songs of 2025 - listen live Join Matt and Mollie as the station’s DJs pick their favourite songs of the year. Attribution News Miley Cyrus confirms engagement to musician Maxx Morando Attribution Culture Legacy Of Spies: BBC announces new John le Carré series Attribution Media Centre Eurovision faces crucial decision over Israel Attribution Europe Dad was a working class hero - Kelly Osbourne Attribution Birmingham & Black Country Is rapper EsDeeKid really Timothee Chalamet - or is it a conspiracy theory? Attribution BBC Bitesize Two teams are shocked at the price of crossing the Colombian border in RATW. Video, 00:01:18 Two teams are shocked at the price of crossing the Colombian border in RATW Attribution BBC One 1:18 View more Food and recipes Meal ideas, cooking tips and more, updated daily to keep you inspired Quick and comforting recipes that will keep you warm all winter long These dishes are perfect for those evenings when you need comfort food but don’t have time to spare. Attribution BBC Food Gloriously gooey chocolate cookie recipes Attribution BBC Food Should you shop now to save on Christmas food? Attribution BBC Food 'This is the best brewing town in the world' Audio, 00:03:20 'This is the best brewing town in the world' Attribution BBC Radio Derby 3:20 How much do you really know about pizza? Attribution BBC Radio 4 View more Money 'Going viral doesn't mean you're earning millions' Attribution Wales Car made famous by Bond was left to rust on a drive - now it's worth £1m Attribution Wales How defrosting your car could land you with a £1,000 fine. Audio, 00:02:27 How defrosting your car could land you with a £1,000 fine Attribution BBC News 2:27 People admit to 'secret spending' without telling partners Attribution Business Comments 463 The city that wants you to buy your daily coffee in Bitcoin. Audio, 00:04:48 The city that wants you to buy your daily coffee in Bitcoin Attribution BBC World Service 4:48 View more Health and wellbeing What is 'locking in' and can it really help you focus? It's thought to help you ignore distractions and achieve your goals - but is it a help or a hindrance? Attribution UK 'I quit dating apps and found the love of my life' Attribution Wales 'Put the kids first': Top tips for separated parents this Christmas. Video, 00:08:25 'Put the kids first': Top tips for separated parents this Christmas Attribution BBC One 8:25 'Botox was like going for coffee - but I had no idea if it was genuine' Attribution Wales More fitness fanatics are turning to weight-loss jabs - but what are the risks?
